Police_Onceki_No.description: Previous policy number from header section

Sigortali_Vergi_No.description: Tax office number - can be masked with asterisks, numeric sequence, or zero

Teminat_Oto_Cam_Klozu.description: Glass coverage clause with complete text. Pattern 1 captures detailed conditions with percentages and monetary amounts ending with 'ödenir.'. Pattern 2 captures simple 'muafiyet uygulanmayacaktır.' cases. Multi-pattern approach ensures complete sentence extraction including line breaks and detailed terms.

Teminat_Ikame_Arac.description: Replacement vehicle policy terms showing yearly frequency and daily limits. Discovered most PDFs contain multiple policies (30-day premium + 7-day basic service). Pattern handles multiline text, Turkish character variations (İkame/ikame), and missing sections. Originally failed on ak_E_128284544_408440924 due to single-line formatting vs multiline, solved with flexible semantic matching.

Teminat_Hasar_Kademesi_Bilgisi.description: No-claims discount information - extracts the discount details after HASARSIZLIK İNDİRİMİ header

patterns: (Sigortalı; hasarlı aracının onarımını.*?ölçütleri karşılayan servislerde.*?yaptırmakta serbesttir\.)
Teminat_Servis_Secimi.description: Service selection terms. Pattern 1 captures general service selection freedom with Treasury standards. Pattern 2 captures non-contracted service penalty terms with flexible percentage handling. Both patterns handle multiline text and variable numbers. Mode 'all' ensures both terms are extracted as they provide complementary service policy information.
